net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component

Interface TreeCellEditor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanValueEditor, Calendar, Checkbox, ComboBox, DoubleEntryField, Field, LocalizedObjectKeyFieldComponent, SearchableComboBox

    public interface TreeCellEditor

    Defines an interface for objects that can edit tree cells.

    The idea of an editor is that the component is used as a "rubber stamp" when the cell is drawn. The same component may be used for several cells, and really should be for best performance. Note that the component is discarded after the cell is drawn, so no state is persisted. Properties such as selection state or user entered data may not be updated in the component(s) as generally the tree model is updated directly.

    NOTE: The component returned from the cell editor method will be referenced using a weak reference. You must hold a strong reference for as long as you need the component. It is recommended to hold the reference as a field in the cell editor implementation. (Components that implement this interface directly will work fine as the cell editor is held as a strong reference).

    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component getTreeCellEditorComponent(Tree tree, TreePath path, Object value, boolean isSelected, boolean isExpanded, boolean isLeaf, int column)
      Returns a Component to use for editing a cell in a tree.

    • Method Detail

      • getTreeCellEditorComponent

        Component getTreeCellEditorComponent(Tree tree,
                                   TreePath path,
                                   Object value,
                                   boolean isSelected,
                                   boolean isExpanded,
                                   boolean isLeaf,
                                   int column)
        Returns a Component to use for editing a cell in a tree.
        Parameters:
        tree - The Tree.
        path - The path to the cell.
        value - The value of the cell.
        isSelected - Indicates if the cell is selected.
        isExpanded - Indicates if the cell is expanded.
        isLeaf - Indiciates if the cell is a leaf node.
        column - The column model index (NOT the model index!).
        Returns:
        A Component that can be used to edit the cell value.
